title: AutoRemote Push (Unofficial)
name: unofficial-autoremote-push
description: Pushes links and text to your Android device via AutoRemote using a toolbar button or the context menu.
author: Engyrus (Jerry Kindall)

preferences.name: device
preferences.title: Device
preferences.description: This add-on supports up to five devices. You are changing settings for the device chosen here.

preferences.name: name
preferences.title: Device Name
preferences.description: Name for the device selected above. Required if more than one device is configured.

preferences.name: api
preferences.title: AutoRemote API URL
preferences.description: In this browser, open the goo.gl URL displayed by the AutoRemote app on your Android device, then paste your personal AutoRemote URL here. This is filled in automagically the first time you visit your personal AutoRemote page.

preferences.name: textcmd
preferences.title: Command for Text Push
preferences.description: The AutoApps command that will be used for pushing text to your Android device. Use a Tasker profile to react to this command.

preferences.name: linkcmd
preferences.title: Command for Link Push
preferences.description: The AutoApps command that will be used for pushing links to your Android device. Use a Tasker profile to react to this command. Leave blank to open the link in your mobile browser.

preferences.name: password
preferences.title: Password
preferences.description: The AutoRemote password set on your device, if any. Not required for normal link pushing.

preferences.name: secure
preferences.title: Force Secure Push
preferences.description: Always use secure connection to push links to AutoRemote. Rewrites API URL as https. This setting is not device-specific.

preferences.name: notify
preferences.title: Desktop Notifications
preferences.description: Confirm pushes and other actions with desktop notifications. Errors are always shown. This setting is not device-specific.
